name: Icy Prison
text:
Cost: 2 AP, 2 mana, 1 signature.
Make a 6d6 elemental attack against a nearby character. If the attack succeeds, that character is locked in ice and is immobilized. Place a number of ice markers on them equal to the attack's damage.
While locked in ice, each 1 damage the character takes removes 1 ice marker. When all ice markers are removed, the effect ends.

Increase the size of your mana pool by 1.
